price: Yoo kafartaniif, (adabbii) Guyyaa ijoollee arrii taasisuu akkamitti eeggattu?
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fakayfa tattaqūna in kafartum yawman yajʿalu al-wil'dāna shīban
